definition: of weather or climate, either of two parallels of latitude about 23.5 degrees to the north and south of the equator representing the points farthest north and south at which the sun can shine directly overhead and constituting the boundaries of the Torrid Zone or tropics
details:
adjective
- of weather or climate
= example: of weather or climate
= synonyms: tropical
- relating to or situated in or characteristic of the tropics (the region on either side of the equator)
= example: relating to or situated in or characteristic of the tropics (the region on either side of the equator)
= synonyms: tropical
noun
- either of two parallels of latitude about 23.5 degrees to the north and south of the equator representing the points farthest north and south at which the sun can shine directly overhead and constituting the boundaries of the Torrid Zone or tropics
